question.text: You notice horse riders in front. What should you do FIRST?

explanation.text: Be particularly careful when approaching horse riders – slow down and be prepared to stop. Always pass wide and slowly and look out for signals given by horse riders. Horses are unpredictable: always treat them as potential hazards and take great care when passing them.

answer.text: Pull out to the middle of the road
Slow down and be ready to stop
